name: Forest of Embers
description:
Join a squirrel and a mouse as they venture far from home in search of a new destiny.

Game created for my third year capstone project. After spending weeks of preparation, planning, and production we have completed the game...for now. One day we may revisit this idea, maybe not but what we created has taught us all a lot.

Created by:

Kayli Coulthard- Project manager https://kaster8000.itch.io/

Cole Millar- Level Design, Programming https://blocksquad1000.itch.io/

Brett Formosa - Animation, Programming https://formosadev.itch.io/

Miguel Prieto - Lead Programming

And me Jenny Sherwood- 2D art & Tech art
